content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --*
    format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as TotalCost
    ,format((sum(CostInBillingCurrency) - (sum(CostInBillingCurrency) / 1.09)), 'N', 'en-us') as [2023 ACD Increase]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/*/ACMMonthlyA*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    --benefitName is not NULL
    --where ChargeType = 'Purchase'
    --and PricingModel = 'Reservation'
    --((ChargeType <> 'Purchase' and PricingModel <> 'Reservation') and PricingModel <> 'Spot') and
    NOT(ChargeType = 'Purchase' and PricingModel = 'Reservation') and PricingModel <> 'Spot' and
    [Date] >= '2021-03-01'
    and [Date] < '2023-04-01'

    --2021-03-01: 9%
    --2023-04-01: 11%
    --2024-02-01: 12%

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost), Location
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where (Cost > 1000.00)
GROUP BY [Location]

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --*
    format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as TotalCost
    ,format((sum(CostInBillingCurrency) - (sum(CostInBillingCurrency) / (1.11 * 1.09))), 'N', 'en-us') as [2023 ACD Increase]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/*/ACMMonthlyA*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    --benefitName is not NULL
    NOT(ChargeType = 'Purchase' and PricingModel = 'Reservation') and PricingModel <> 'Spot' and
    --((ChargeType <> 'Purchase' and PricingModel <> 'Reservation') and PricingModel <> 'Spot') and

    [Date] >= '2023-04-01'
    and [Date] < '2024-02-01'

    --2021-03-01: 9%
    --2023-04-01: 11%
    --2024-02-01: 12%

--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ConsumedService
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ConsumedService --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

content.query:
--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ResourceLocation
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ResourceLocation --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by ActiveWBS
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType
    ActiveWBS
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    --,format(CostInBillingCurrency, 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --and ActiveWBS is null or ActiveWBS = ''
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'),
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by CostAllocationType
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    CostAllocationType
    ,ActiveWBS
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by CostAllocationType, ActiveWBS --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'),
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

--
--   Cost by ConsumedService
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,ConsumedService
    --,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, ConsumedService --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

content.query:
--
--   Cost by MeterCategory
--
SELECT
    --TOP 1000 
    --Tags 
    --CostAllocationType,
    ActiveWBS
    ,MeterCategory
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    --,SubscriptionWBS
    --,[SubscriptionServiceNow-App] 
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    --where CostAllocationType not in ('CI', 'APPID', 'WBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    --where CostAllocationCode = '' or CostAllocationType = '' or CostAllocationCode = 'TOBESPECIFIED' or CostAllocationType = 'TOBESPECIFIED'
    group by ActiveWBS, MeterCategory --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), CostAllocationType,
    --group by CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) desc --, CostAllocationCode, CostAllocationType

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    ServiceInfo2 as [Image Type]
    ,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    ,FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]   
    --,MeterSubCategory
    --,Tags
    --,ResourceId
    --,SubscriptionId
    --,SubscriptionName
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and Tags not like '%"Cluster%' and Tags not like '%"Kubernetes%' --and ServiceInfo2 is NULL --and SubscriptionId = '019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'
    group by ServiceInfo2, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')
    --group by ResourceId, ServiceInfo2, MeterSubCategory, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') --Tags, 
    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId), FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') DESC
    order by FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM'), [Image Type]
    --order by FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    ServiceInfo2 as [Image Type]
    --,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    ,FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]   
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Tags
    ,ResourceId
    --,SubscriptionId
    --,SubscriptionName
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and Tags not like '%"Cluster%' and Tags not like '%"Kubernetes%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL --and SubscriptionId = '019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'
    --group by ServiceInfo2, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')
    group by ResourceId, ServiceInfo2, MeterSubCategory, FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM'), Tags 
    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId), FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') DESC
    order by FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --distinct(ResourceId),
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    count(DISTINCT(ResourceId)) as [ResourceId Count]
    ,ServiceModel
    --,count(ServiceModel) as [ServiceModel Count]
    --,*
    --,Quantity
    --,ai_VCPUs
    --,Quantity * ai_VCPUs as [CPU Hours]
    --,sum(ai_VCPUs) as [vCPU count]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ChargeType = 'Usage' and ServiceModel = 'PaaS'
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage' --and benefitName is not NULL --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') is NULL --or MeterCategory = 'Cloud Services'
--group by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)
--order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) --, Quantity DESC
group by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ServiceModel--, ResourceId
order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date]
    --,Quantity
    --,ai_VCPUs
    --,Quantity * ai_VCPUs as [CPU Hours]
    ,sum(ai_VCPUs) as [vCPU count]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage' --and benefitName is not NULL --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') is NULL --or MeterCategory = 'Cloud Services'
group by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) --, Quantity DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date]
    --,Quantity
    --,ai_VCPUs
    --,Quantity * ai_VCPUs as [CPU Hours]
    --,ai_VCPUs as VCPUs
    ,sum(Quantity * ai_VCPUs) as [CPU Normalised Hours]
    ,sum(Quantity) as [CPU Non-Normalised Hours]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage' --and benefitName is not NULL --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') is NULL --or MeterCategory = 'Cloud Services'
group by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) --, Quantity DESC

SELECT
    --Top 100
    upper(SubscriptionName) as SubscriptionName
    ,upper(ResourceGroup) as ResourceGroup
    --,CostInBillingCurrency as Cost
    --,*
    ,ActiveWBS
    ,CostAllocationType
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/20240201-20240229/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_20240201-20240229.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    --upper(ActiveWBS) <> 'C.TDI.IT.00010' and
    --upper(ActiveWBS) = 'E.RDI.10512' and
    upper(SubscriptionName) like 'S913-AURORA-NON-PRODUCTION'

-- Create the Calendar table
CREATE TABLE Calendar (
    [Date] DATE PRIMARY KEY,
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    [Day] INT,
    [Quarter] INT,
    [DayOfWeek] INT,
    [Weekday] BIT,
    [WeekOfYear] INT,
    [MonthName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [DayName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [IsHoliday] BIT
);

-- Populate the Calendar table
DECLARE @StartDate DATE = '2000-01-01';
DECLARE @EndDate DATE = '2030-12-31';

WITH CalendarData AS (
    SELECT
        DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate) AS [Date],
        DATEPART(YEAR, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Year],
        DATEPART(MONTH, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Month],
        DATEPART(DAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Day],
        DATEPART(QUARTER, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [Quarter],
        DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [DayOfWeek],
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [Weekday],
        DATEPART(WEEK, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [WeekOfYear],
        DATENAME(MONTH, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [MonthName],
        DATENAME(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate)) AS [DayName],
        0 AS [IsHoliday] -- Set IsHoliday value based on your specific requirements
    FROM sys.all_columns AS c1
    CROSS JOIN sys.all_columns AS c2
    WHERE DATEADD(DAY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) - 1, @StartDate) <= @EndDate
)

INSERT INTO Calendar ([Date], [Year], [Month], [Day], [Quarter], [DayOfWeek], [Weekday], [WeekOfYear], [MonthName], [DayName], [IsHoliday])
SELECT [Date], [Year], [Month], [Day], [Quarter], [DayOfWeek], [Weekday], [WeekOfYear], [MonthName], [DayName], [IsHoliday]
FROM CalendarData;

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW tsc_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_Aggregated_overview
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_Aggregated_overview.parquet/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

declare @last_month varchar(6) = FORMAT(EOMONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -1), 'yyyyMM'),
        @sql varchar(max) = ''

set @sql = '
SELECT
    SubscriptionId, 
    SubscriptionName,
    [Date],
    ResourceGroup, 
    ResourceName, 
    ResourceId, 
    MeterCategory, 
    MeterSubCategory, 
    MeterName,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    UnitPrice,
    EffectivePrice,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    ServiceInfo2, 
    PartNumber,
    AdditionalInfo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/' + @last_month + '*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]
WHERE ([Date] >= ''2023-01-30'' and [Date] <= ''2023-02-01'') 
    and (ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachines/%'' or ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%'')
    and (MeterSubCategory like ''%Windows%'' or ServiceInfo2 = ''Windows Server BYOL'')

UNION --ALL

SELECT
    SubscriptionId, 
    SubscriptionName,
    [Date],
    ResourceGroup, 
    ResourceName, 
    ResourceId, 
    MeterCategory, 
    MeterSubCategory, 
    MeterName,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    UnitPrice,
    EffectivePrice,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    ServiceInfo2, 
    PartNumber,
    AdditionalInfo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]
WHERE ([Date] >= ''2023-01-30'' and [Date] <= ''2023-02-01'') 
    and (ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachines/%'' or ResourceId like ''%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%'')
    and (MeterSubCategory like ''%Windows%'' or ServiceInfo2 = ''Windows Server BYOL'')
'

EXECUTE(@sql)

SELECT
    SubscriptionName, sum(Cost) as Cost, ConsumedService --, substring([Date],0,8) as [Date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2021/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where substring([Date],0,8) = '2021-01'
GROUP BY SubscriptionName, ConsumedService, substring([Date],0,8)
ORDER BY SubscriptionName, ConsumedService, substring([Date],0,8)

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW reservation_cost
AS

SELECT
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    eventDate,
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    currency,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/costreport_reservations_monthly_2021.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --DISTINCT(ConsumedService), 
    --sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantitySum,
    --COUNT(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantityCount,
    --JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores'),
    --MeterName
    --top 100 *
    ConsumedService, 
    ConsumedQuantity,
    InstanceId,
    --AdditionalInfo,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as AddInfo_vCores,
    MeterName,
    MeterCategory,
    PartNumber,
    [Date]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE (MeterCategory LIKE '%Database%' or  
        MeterCategory LIKE '%SQL%') AND 
      (MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Storage' AND 
        MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%License%') AND
      (MeterName NOT LIKE '%DTU%') 
--GROUP BY ConsumedService

      InstanceId = '/subscriptions/20666D8E-81B0-479F-8D56-D13FC4E5C12F/resourceGroups/osdu-r3mvp-sreqn-7wd9-rg/providers/Microsoft.DBforPostgreSQL/servers/osdu-r3mvp-sreqn-7wd9-pg'

SELECT
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as AddInfo_vCores,
    MeterName,
    MeterCategory,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) AS [Date],
    sum(Cost) AS Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,MeterName
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Azure Databricks'
    GROUP by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), MeterName, MeterCategory, SubscriptionName --MeterName, 
    order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as ai_VCPUs,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as ai_vCores,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.UsageType') as ai_UsageType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ImageType') as ai_ImageType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ai_ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VMName') as ai_VMName,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VMProperties') as ai_VMProperties,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as ai_AHB,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ConsumedQuantity') as ai_ConsumedQuantity,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.DatabaseName') as ai_DatabaseName
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20220201-20220228/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20220201-20220228.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    where JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') != ''

declare @HUB_Date as varchar(10)
set @HUB_Date = '2023-01-21'
SELECT
    --TOP 10  *
    count(ResourceName)
    --ResourceName
    --,substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) as [Date]
    --,MeterCategory
    --,MeterName
    --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE (AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as int)) as vCPUs
    --,ResourceId
    --sum(cast(JSON_VALUE (AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as int)) as vCPU
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/20230101-20230131/ACMDailyActualCost_653a874b-ede7-4670-abf7-fde225a5544f.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL' and substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) = @HUB_Date
    group by ResourceId, ResourceName ,substring(cast([Date] as varchar),1,10) ,MeterCategory, MeterName

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as AHB, 
    MeterSubCategory,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product,
    InstanceId
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2022/06/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE ServiceInfo2 NOT LIKE 'Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%')
--WHERE InstanceId = '/subscriptions/f9892073-3b09-40b7-8f33-1e0320e683c8/resourceGroups/rg-echomodeldist-test/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sql-echomodeldist-test/databases/sql-echomodeldist-test/sqldb-echomodeldist-test'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterSubCategory, PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB'), InstanceId
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), PartNumber, Product
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    Product,
    PartNumber,
    MeterCategory
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' --and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), PartNumber, Product, MeterCategory
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/savings/monthly/*/*/*-HUB_Windows.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

    --,Tags

    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'

    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId), FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') DESC

    --order by FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM')

-- This is auto-generated code

    --,count(DISTINCT ResourceId) as [Count]
    ,FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]   
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Tags
    ,ResourceId
    --,SubscriptionId
    --,SubscriptionName
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2022*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and Tags not like '%"Cluster%' and Tags not like '%"Kubernetes%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL --and SubscriptionId = '019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/019958ea-fe2c-4e14-bbd9-0d2db8ed7cfc/resourceGroups/MC_AURORA11_AURORA11_NORTHEUROPE/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/aks-gpu-36545846-vmss'

    --order by count(DISTINCT ResourceId), FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM') DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11) AS eventDate,
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    currency,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM

        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/costreport_reservations_monthly_2021.csv',

        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
where reservationOrderName NOT LIKE '%SQL%' and reservationOrderId != 'd5b99270-d26e-49b1-82dc-d7cb16a9181a' and reservationOrderName LIKE '%SUSE%'
order by substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId') as ReservationOrderId, 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationId') LIKE '%%' and Product Not like 'Windows%'
--and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId')
ORDER BY ConsumedQuantity DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date],
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId') as ReservationOrderId, 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationId') LIKE '%%' and Product Not like 'Windows%'
--and MeterSubCategory = 'Reservation-Base VM' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY substring([Date],0,8), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ReservationOrderId')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and MeterSubCategory != 'Reservation-Base VM' and MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Windows%'
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ConsumedService = 'Microsoft.MachineLearningServices' and MeterName = 'Compute' and AdditionalInfo NOT LIKE '%Standard_DS[0-9]_v2%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8)
--GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType')
--GROUP BY REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING(AdditionalInfo,CHARINDEX('Standard_',AdditionalInfo)+11,2),'_',''),'s','')
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

folder.name: Ad Hoc Cost Report Requests/Cloud Cost Facts

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --top 100 *
    --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    upper(ConsumedService) as ConsumedService
    ,upper(MeterCategory) as [MeterCategory]
    ,FORMAT(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where ConsumedService is not null --and MeterCategory like '%SQL%'
    group BY upper(ConsumedService), upper(MeterCategory)
    order by upper(ConsumedService), upper(MeterCategory)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,ActiveWBS
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,MeterCategory
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE
    --ActiveWBS = 'C.BAX.40.076'
    ActiveWBS in ('C.BAX.40.003', 'C.BAX.40.006', 'C.BAX.40.015', 'C.BAX.40.020', 'C.BAX.40.022', 'C.BAX.40.041', 'C.BAX.40.054', 
    'C.BAX.40.060', 'C.BAX.40.068', 'C.BAX.40.072', 'C.BAX.40.073', 'C.BAX.40.076', 'C.BAX.40.083', 'C.BAX.40.085', 'C.BAX.40.090', 
    'C.BAX.40.094', 'C.BAX.40.095', 'C.BAX.40.096', 'C.BAX.40.098', 'C.BAX.40.099', 'C.BAX.40.100', 'C.BAX.40.102', 'C.BAX.40.103', 
    'C.BAX.40.105', 'C.BAX.40.106', 'C.BAX.40.107', 'C.BAX.41.003', 'C.BAX.41.004', 'C.BAX.41.008', 'C.BAX.41.009', 'C.BAX.41.012', 
    'C.BAX.41.022', 'C.BAX.41.025', 'C.BAX.41.047', 'C.GBX.AD.MS332', 'C.GBX.AD.MS336', 'C.GBX.AD.MS337', 'C.ITD.07.006', 'C.ITD.07.008', 
    'C.ITD.07.016', 'C.ITD.07.017', 'C.ITD.07.021', 'C.ITD.07.024', 'C.ITX.10.049', 'C.TDI.IT.00015', 'C.TDI.IT.00143', 'C.TDI.MM.084', 
    'E.B00.01935.A1', 'E.TDI.00012.05.02', 'E.TDI.00053.03')
    group by format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), ActiveWBS, SubscriptionName, ResourceGroup, MeterCategory
    order by [Date], ActiveWBS, Cost Desc

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [Plant Cost]
    ,SubscriptionName
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    --where SubscriptionName = 'S138-SAP-Solution-Landscape'
    where upper(SubscriptionName) LIKE '%-MSS-%'
    --where SubscriptionName in ('S289-HAO-Solution-NONSOX-PROD', 'S039-IOC-Solutions', 'S288-HAO-Solution-NONSOX-NONPROD', 'S147-Omnia-Industrial-IoT')
    group by format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), SubscriptionName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.UsageType') as UsageType,
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs,
    substring(FORMAT (usageStartDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8) AS [Date],
    sum(consumedQuantity) as consumedQuantity,
    sum(resourceRate) as resourceRate,
    sum(extendedCost) as extendedCost,
    isRecurringCharge
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/Marketplace_Charges_2021.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.UsageType'),
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'),
    substring(FORMAT (usageStartDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,8),
    JSON_VALUE(additionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'),
    isRecurringCharge
    order by extendedCost DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    PublisherType
    ,PublisherName
    ,PlanName
    ,SubscriptionId
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,[Date]
    ,Quantity
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,UnitPrice
    ,CostInBillingCurrency
    ,ConsumedService
    ,ResourceId
    ,ResourceName
    ,ai_ServiceType
    ,ai_VCPUs
    ,CostAllocationType
    ,CostAllocationCode
    ,ActiveWBS
    ,AppID
    ,Application_Name
    --,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where PublisherType = 'Marketplace'

    *

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'

SubscriptionName

        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet',

SELECT
    --TOP 100 *,
    --ChargeType
    --,EffectivePrice
    --,UnitPrice
    --,Quantity
    --,(UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity as [Cost Saving]
    --,IsRIUsage
    sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where (IsRIUsage = 'RI Usage' or ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation')
    and [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'

properties.description:
Used RI savings - Unused RI cost
Used RI is where IsRIUsage = 'RI Usage'
Unused RI is where ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation'
When an RI is unused in the Amortized file the UnitPrice is 0 which means the sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total] calculation can be used to calculate both the saving and the cost in the same line

content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    --ChargeType
    --EffectivePrice
    --,UnitPrice
    --,Quantity
    --,(UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity as [Cost Saving]
    --,IsRIUsage
    sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total]
    --sum((EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as [Cost Saving Total]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where (IsRIUsage = 'RI Usage' or ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation')
    and [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
    and upper(benefitName) like 'S037%' -- filtering for the S037 reservations
    --and upper(benefitName) not like 'S037%'  -- filtering for the non S037 reservations i.e. the SAP single scope reservations

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    --ReservationName
    --,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    --avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    --,EffectivePrice as EffectivePrice
    --,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [PAYG Cost]
    --,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    --,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/202303*/A*.parquet',

where

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    jsonContent,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.armSkuName') AS armSkuName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.term') AS term,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.region') AS region,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.eventDate') AS eventDate,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationOrderId') AS reservationOrderId,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.description') AS [description],
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.quantity') AS quantity,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.amount') AS amount,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.reservationOrderName') AS reservationOrderName,
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.billingFrequency') AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2022/*/costreport_reservations_monthly_*.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '`',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '},'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent nvarchar(MAX),
        armSkuName varchar(MAX),
        term varchar(MAX),
        region varchar(MAX),
        eventDate varchar(MAX),
        reservationOrderId nvarchar(MAX),
        [description] varchar(MAX),
        quantity varchar(MAX),
        amount varchar(MAX),
        reservationOrderName varchar(MAX),
        billingFrequency varchar(MAX)
    )
    AS [result]
    --where armSkuName NOT LIKE 'SQL%'
    --where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
    order by eventDate

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    region AS region,
    substring(FORMAT (eventDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') ,0,11) AS eventDate,
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    description AS [description],
    quantity AS quantity,
    amount AS amount,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/annual/2021/reservation_cost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4209',
    '/SUBSCRIPTIONS/5F9DEC8C-8BFD-40E1-B7C7-85FA538F77ED/RESOURCEGROUPS/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/PROVIDERS/MICROSOFT.COMPUTE/VIRTUALMACHINES/MMP-TS4210',

SELECT 
[ResourceName]
,[ServiceInfo2]
,[Date]
,[MeterCategory]
,[MeterSubCategory]
,[Quantity]
,[EffectivePrice]
,[CostInBillingCurrency]
,[UnitPrice]
,[SubscriptionId]
,[SubscriptionName]
,[ResourceGroup]
,[PublisherType]
,[PublisherName]
,[ReservationId]
,[ReservationName]
,[ResourceId]
,[AdditionalInfo]
,[MeterName]
,[MeterRegion]
,[UnitOfMeasure]
,[ResourceLocation]
,[ProductName]

 FROM [dbo].[Combined_Actual_Savings]
where upper(ResourceName) in ('CVD-240002', 'CVD-240003', 'CVD-240007', 'CVD-240008', 'CVD-240013', 
                        'CVD-240022', 'CVD-240026', 'CVD-240029', 'CVD-240030', 'CVD-240032', 
                        'CVD-240033', 'CVD-240037', 'CVD-240039', 'CVD-240040', 'CVD-240042',

        and [Date] >= '2023-01-28' and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'

ResourceName
,ResourceId
,Tags
,SubscriptionName
,[Date]
FROM [dbo].[Combined_Actual_Savings]
where upper(ResourceName) in (--'MMP-TS4401', 'MMP-TS4402',
                        'MMP-TS4302', 'MMP-TS4301')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName,
    ResourceName,
    ResourceGroup,
    [Date] as Date,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) + '-' + substring([Date],4,2)  as FormattedDate,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) as [ShortDate],
    ResourceLocation,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    Quantity,
    CostInBillingCurrency,
    EffectivePrice,
    UnitPrice,
    PayGPrice,    
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    MeterName,   
    ServiceInfo1,
    ServiceInfo2,
    ReservationId,
    ReservationName,     
    PartNumber,
    PlanName,
    Term,
    CostCenter,
    ConsumedService,
    ResourceId,
    Tags,
    OfferId,
    AdditionalInfo,
    PublisherType,
    PublisherName,
    ChargeType,
    Frequency,
    PricingModel,
    ServiceFamily,
    benefitId,
    benefitName,
    SubscriptionId
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2022*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S009-Desktop-Service TS1' or SubscriptionName = 'S220-Desktop-Service TS2' and substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) >= '2022-05'
        and substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) <= '2022-08'
--order by FormattedDate

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
    --count(SubscriptionName)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/2022*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S034-Geology-Geophysics' and 
    MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' --and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' --and Product LIKE '%Spot%'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --top 100 *
        JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs,
    substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2) + '-' + substring([Date],4,2) as [Date],
    PartNumber,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    MeterName,
    ServiceInfo2,
    --sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    Quantity as Quantity,
    --sum(EffectivePrice) as EffectivePrice,
    EffectivePrice as EffectivePrice,
    --sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as CostInBillingCurrency, 
    CostInBillingCurrency as CostInBillingCurrency, 
    UnitPrice,
    --sum(PayGPrice) as PayGPrice,
    PayGPrice as PayGPrice,
    benefitName,
    ResourceName,
    ResourceLocation,
    ResourceId
    --count(SubscriptionName)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2022*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2022*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where SubscriptionName = 'S034-Geology-Geophysics' and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' --and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
--group by JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), 
--        substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2), PartNumber, UnitOfMeasure, ProductName, MeterCategory, 
--        MeterSubCategory, MeterName, ServiceInfo2, UnitPrice, benefitName, ServiceInfo2
order by substring([Date],7,4) + '-' + substring([Date],1,2)

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/daily/*-cleaned.parquet',

(ResourceGroup = 'Hub-Investigation-SQLDB-NoHUB' or 
ResourceGroup = 'HUB-Investigation-MI' or 
ResourceGroup = 'Hub-Investigation2')
order by [Date] DESC

--/subscriptions/A6ABE45D-E638-4325-A7E9-5559450AA434/resourceGroups/SQL-MI-NE/providers/Microsoft.Sql/managedInstances/sql-mi01


--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' --and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
--GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), PartNumber, Product
--ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [S909 Cost]

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',

    --where SubscriptionName LIKE 'S138%'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    [Date],
    PartNumber,
    ResourceRate,
    ConsumedQuantity,
    Cost,
    ServiceTier,

    ResourceGroup
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/2022/*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE SubscriptionName = 'S162-EDM-DataCatalog' AND ResourceGroup = 'CoreResources' and [Date] > '2022-05-27T00:00:00.0000000'
order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [S909 Cost]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where SubscriptionName = 'S909-InfrCorpNet'
    group by format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202404*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'SQL Database'
        and MeterSubCategory like '%Storage%'
        and [Date] = '2024-04-03'
        --and SubscriptionName like 'S909%'
        --and MeterName <> 'Backup RA-GRS Data Stored'
        --and PartNumber = 'AAD-74288'
        --and PartNumber = 'AAD-17911'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as AHB, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as vCores, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    --PartNumber,
    ProductName
    ,ResourceId
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%') 
--WHERE JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True' or MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%'

-----Below line extracts non HUB SQL entries for testing & investigation purposes
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'False') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Hybrid%') and Product LIKE 'SQL Server%' and Product NOT LIKE 'SQL Server Express%'

GROUP BY  JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory, format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), ProductName, ResourceId
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), Quantity DESC

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as AHB, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as vCores, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    --PartNumber,
    Product,
    InstanceId
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

--WHERE MeterCategory LIKE 'SQL%'

-----Due to MS bug where SQL DB's with HUB applied are identified as SQL MI DB's we are only querying for SQL MI and SQL VM below. If MS fix the bug the correct query for SQL DB with HUB will need to be identified and added to the where section of the query

WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%') 

-----Below line extracts non HUB SQL entries for testing & investigation purposes
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'False') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Hybrid%') and Product LIKE 'SQL Server%' and Product NOT LIKE 'SQL Server Express%'

GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), MeterSubCategory, PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB'), InstanceId, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores'), MeterCategory, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC
--order by CAST(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as int) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 
    ai_ServiceType as ServiceType, 
    ai_AHB as AHB, 
    ai_vCores as vCores, 
    ai_VCPUs as VCPUs, 
    MeterCategory,
    MeterSubCategory,
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Short Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    --PartNumber,
    ProductName,
    ResourceId
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and ai_AHB = 'True') 
or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%') 
and format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') >= '2022-11' and format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') <= '2023-10' 
--WHERE JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True' or MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%'

-----Below line extracts non HUB SQL entries for testing & investigation purposes
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'False') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory NOT LIKE '%Hybrid%') and Product LIKE 'SQL Server%' and Product NOT LIKE 'SQL Server Express%'

GROUP BY  ai_ServiceType, ai_AHB, ai_vCores, ai_VCPUs, MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory, format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), ProductName, ResourceId
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), Quantity DESC

SELECT
    SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ProductName
    ,ResourceName
    --,Quantity
    --,UnitPrice
    --,benefitName
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202305*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
        (SubscriptionName = 'S009-Desktop-Service TS1' 
        or SubscriptionName = 'S220-Desktop-Service TS2')
        and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
        and ProductName like 'SQL%'
        and (ProductName not like 'SQL Server Dev%' AND ProductName not like 'SQL Server Ex%')
        --and ResourceName = 'CVD-200661'
    group by SubscriptionName, ResourceGroup, ProductName, ResourceName--, Quantity, UnitPrice, benefitName

SELECT
    [Location] as [Location],
    ResourceLocation,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') as AHB,
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as vCores, 
    MeterSubCategory,
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product,
    InstanceId,
    AdditionalInfo
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE ServiceInfo2 NOT LIKE 'Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE '%BYOL' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
--WHERE (MeterCategory = 'SQL Managed Instance' and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB') = 'True') or (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory LIKE '%Hybrid%')
--WHERE InstanceId = '/subscriptions/f9892073-3b09-40b7-8f33-1e0320e683c8/resourceGroups/rg-echomodeldist-test/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sql-echomodeldist-test/databases/sql-echomodeldist-test/sqldb-echomodeldist-test'
--WHERE ResourceGroup = 'equr-ep-dev-cmn-01'
--WHERE ResourceGroup = 'master-rg-tst'
WHERE MeterSubCategory = 'Compute Reservation' --and ServiceTier = 'SQL RI'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), MeterSubCategory, PartNumber, Product, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.AHB'), InstanceId, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores'), AdditionalInfo, [Location], ResourceLocation, ServiceTier
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), sum(ConsumedQuantity) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    reservationOrderId AS reservationOrderId,
    reservationOrderName AS reservationOrderName,
    armSkuName AS armSkuName,
    term AS term,
    substring(eventDate,0,11) AS eventDate,
    quantity AS quantity,

    currency,
    billingFrequency AS billingFrequency
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/reservations/2022/*/reservation-charges.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--where reservationOrderId = '7334aae9-5adc-4e4c-a58b-801d095a14df'
where reservationOrderName LIKE '%SQL%' --and reservationOrderId != 'd5b99270-d26e-49b1-82dc-d7cb16a9181a'
order by substring(eventDate,0,11)

-- This is auto-generated code

    --TOP 100 *
    ReservationId
    ,ReservationName
    ,SubscriptionName
    ,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,Term
    ,ChargeType

content.query:
declare @thirtydaysago datetime
declare @now datetime
set @now = getdate()
set @thirtydaysago = dateadd(day,-30,@now)

SELECT
    format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as vCPUs
    --,AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as vCPUs
    ,ProductName
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    --,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    --,sum(Quantity) * AVG(cast(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as INT)) as [Normalised Quantity]
    ,Quantity
    ,benefitName
    ,*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20230101-20230131/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230101-20230131.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and benefitName is null and [Date] >= @thirtydaysago and MeterName not like 'A%'
--group by [Date], JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ProductName, benefitName
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM-dd')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 10 
    UnitPrice, 
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20240101-20240131/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyActualCost_20240101-20240131.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where benefitName like 'Compute%'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,[Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,ChargeType
    ,PricingModel
    ,benefitName
    ,Quantity
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,UnitPrice
    ,CostInBillingCurrency
    ,PayGPrice
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Usage' and PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan'
order by [Date] DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    SubscriptionName
    ,ResourceGroup
    ,ResourceLocation
    ,[Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,ChargeType
    ,PricingModel
    ,benefitName
    ,Quantity
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,UnitPrice
    ,Quantity * UnitPrice as PAYG_Cost
    ,Quantity * EffectivePrice as SP_Amount_Consumed
    ,(Quantity * UnitPrice) - (Quantity * EffectivePrice) as Saving
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'Usage' and PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan'
order by [Date] DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyActualCost_364ce664-c75b-437f-83c4-c74d393e6da3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
where PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan' and ChargeType = 'Purchase' --and SubscriptionName = 'S037-Cost-Management-reservations'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyAmortizedCost/20221101-20221130/ACMDailyAmortizedCost_c2efb564-3599-4f9d-a5a8-800a769844e3.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE

--where [Date] = '11/02/2022'
where PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan' and ChargeType = 'UnusedSavingsPlan' --and SubscriptionName = 'S037-Cost-Management-reservations'
order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code

    MeterName
    ,UnitPrice
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,PartNumber
    ,BasePrice
    ,MarketPrice
    ,MeterType
    ,MeterCategory
    ,ServiceFamily
    ,Product
    ,MeterRegion

    --distinct(ServiceFamily)

        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/pricesheet/portal-export/pricesheet-latest/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
    MeterCategory = 'Sentinel'
    and OfferID = 'MS-AZR-0017P'
    and MeterRegion = 'EU West'
    and MeterName not like '%Classic%'
    order by UnitPrice

content.query:
SELECT
    --*
    --SubscriptionName
    --,ResourceGroup
    --ProductName
    MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    --,ResourceLocation
    --,MeterName
    --,ProductName
    --,UnitPrice
    --,ProductName
    --,ResourceName
    --,UnitOfMeasure
    --,format(sum(Quantity), 'N', 'en-us') as Quantity
    ,format(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        --BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where 
        ProductName like '%SSD Managed Disks%'
        and MeterName like '%Disk%'
        and MeterName <> 'Disk Operations'
    group by MeterCategory, MeterSubCategory--, UnitOfMeasure--, ProductName --MeterName --, ResourceLocation--, ResourceName, ResourceGroup, ProductName, ProductName, SubscriptionName, UnitPrice,
    order by sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    ResourceName
    --,format([Date], 'yyyy-MM-dd') as [Date]
    ,MeterCategory
    ,MeterSubCategory
    ,MeterName
    ,UnitOfMeasure
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,UnitPrice
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as CostInBillingCurrency
    ,PartNumber
    ,PlanName
    ,ResourceLocation
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/20230301-20230331/ACMMonthlyActualCost_20230301-20230331.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where SubscriptionId = '66638e28-3650-4b8c-a097-c0945a79fd90' 
        and MeterCategory = 'Storage'
        and ResourceName = 'asdashared'
        and MeterSubCategory = 'Tiered Block Blob'
        and MeterName like '%Data Stored'
    group by 
        ResourceName
        --format([Date], 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        ,MeterCategory
        ,MeterSubCategory
        ,MeterName
        ,UnitOfMeasure
        --,Quantity
        ,UnitPrice
        ,EffectivePrice
        --,CostInBillingCurrency
        ,PartNumber
        ,PlanName
        ,ResourceLocation

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    MeterCategory,
    MeterName,
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    sum(Cost) as Cost,
    UnitOfMeasure
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Azure Data Share' or 
    MeterCategory = 'Azure NetApp Files' OR
    MeterCategory = 'Backup' OR
    MeterCategory = 'Storage' OR
    MeterCategory = 'StorSimple'
GROUP BY MeterCategory, MeterName, substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), UnitOfMeasure
ORDER BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterCategory

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    Redundancy,
    sum(StorageInGb) as StorageInGb
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniadlseun.dfs.core.windows.net/dls/enterprise/data/IT-Asset/InformationAssets/OmniaFacts/Dataset/AcdcDataset/AzureStorageAccountSizeByRedundancy/2022/03/AzureStorageSizeByRedundancy/part-00000-ecca91e8-c471-4ee4-ad71-8e0ba8d5c669-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) LIKE '2021%'
GROUP by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), Redundancy
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' AND
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%' AND
    ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE 
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' and 
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%'

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    sum(Cost), [MeterSubCategory]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/*/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE   
    [result].[MeterCategory] = 'Storage' and 
    [result].[MeterSubCategory] NOT LIKE '%Bandwidth%' and 
    ([result].[Date] BETWEEN '2021-04-01' and '2022-03-31')
GROUP by [MeterSubCategory]
ORDER by sum(Cost) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) as [Date],
    [MeterSubCategory], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    UnitOfMeasure,
    sum(Cost) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' and UnitOfMeasure LIKE '%GB/Month'
GROUP by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterSubCategory, UnitOfMeasure
ORDER by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), sum(Cost) DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8) AS [Date],
    MeterName,
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) AS ConsumedQuantity
    --UnitOfMeasure
    --*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://omniaacdcdlsprod.dfs.core.windows.net/tempdata/monthly/2021/*/*_cleaned.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' AND ServiceTier = 'Tables' and Product NOT LIKE '%Operations%'
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Storage' AND (MeterName LIKE '%Data Stored' or MeterName LIKE '%Index')
--WHERE MeterName LIKE 'Data Stored' 
GROUP BY substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterName
order by substring(FORMAT ([Date],'yyyy-MM-DD') ,0,8), MeterName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    COUNT(AccountId)
    --JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType') as CostAllocationType
    --Tags
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/2022/05/ca8464bb-18e5-42b1-a4e6-7b193ee4d366.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
--where UPPER(JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType')) = 'CI' 
--UPPER(JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType')) != '' AND
--UPPER(JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType')) != 'WBS' AND
--UPPER(JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType')) != 'APPID' AND
--UPPER(JSON_VALUE(Tags, '$.CostAllocationType')) != 'TOBESPECIFIED' 

--where upper(Tags) LIKE '%COSTALLOCATIONTYPE%'

--where JSON_VALUE(UPPER(Tags), '$.COSTALLOCATIONTYPE') = 'CI' 
--JSON_VALUE(UPPER(Tags), '$.COSTALLOCATIONTYPE') = ''
--JSON_VALUE(UPPER(Tags), '$.COSTALLOCATIONTYPE') = 'WBS'
--JSON_VALUE(UPPER(Tags), '$.COSTALLOCATIONTYPE') = 'APPID'
--JSON_VALUE(UPPER(Tags), '$.COSTALLOCATIONTYPE') = 'TOBESPECIFIED'

SELECT
    --top 1000
    --JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.vCores') as vCores, 
    --avg(JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs')) as VCPUs,
    --MeterCategory, 
    --MeterSubCategory, 
    --ServiceInfo2, 
    --PartNumber,
    --ReservationName,
    --Quantity,
    --UnitOfMeasure, 
    --MeterName,
    --ProductName,
    --[Date],
    --ResourceGroup, 
    --ResourceName, 
    --ResourceId
    max(MeterCategory), 
    max(MeterSubCategory), 
    ServiceInfo2, 
    max(PartNumber),
    max(ReservationName),
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    max(UnitOfMeasure), 
    max(MeterName),
    max(ProductName),
    [Date],
    max(ResourceGroup), 
    max(ResourceName), 
    max(ResourceId)
    --UnitPrice,
    --EffectivePrice,
    --CostInBillingCurrency,
    --AdditionalInfo
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202301*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE (ResourceId like '%/virtualMachines/%' or ResourceId like '%/virtualMachineScaleSets/%') and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
    --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
    --and MeterSubCategory = 'Dv3/DSv3 Series Windows'
    --and ReservationName != '' 
    --and  ReservationName is not NULL
    --and MeterSubCategory != 'Windows Server'
    --and ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL'
    --and ServiceInfo2 = ''
    --and (MeterSubCategory like '%Windows%') 
    --and (MeterSubCategory != 'Windows Server') and (MeterSubCategory != 'Windows Server Burst')
    --and JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') = 4
    and (MeterSubCategory like '%Windows%' and ServiceInfo2 is NULL) or (ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL')
    --and (MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses' and MeterSubCategory = 'Windows Server')
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/fa020411-3a3b-443d-8b2f-ed3ac1a4029c/resourceGroups/S230-DC-FORECAST-CLIENT/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets/vmss-dc-forecast-client'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/5f9dec8c-8bfd-40e1-b7c7-85fa538f77ed/resourceGroups/CITRIX-XD-DE028C6C-1A1E-4370-9244-39C08AA856CE-C5Q51/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/MMP-TS4212'
    --and ResourceId = '/subscriptions/a6abe45d-e638-4325-a7e9-5559450aa434/resourceGroups/INFPROD-NOW/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/WS4253'
    and [Date] = '2023-01-10'
    group by ResourceId, [Date], ServiceInfo2
    order by [Date]
    --order by JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') DESC

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 10 *
    --ReservationName
    --,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    --,avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    --,EffectivePrice
    --,Quantity
    --,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [Equinor PAYG Cost]
    --,EffectivePrice * Quantity as [RI Cost]
    --,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    --,ProductOrderName
    --,PartNumber
    --,ChargeType
    --,PricingModel
    sum(Quantity)as Quantity
    ,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/202303*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation' 
    and (PricingModel = 'Reservation') 
    and (ReservationName like 'S037_%' OR ReservationName like 'VM_RI_%')
    --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' --and format([Date],'yyyy-MM') = '2022-12'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ProductOrderName,PartNumber, ChargeType, PricingModel --, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType')
--order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 10 *
    ReservationName
    ,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    --,avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    ,EffectivePrice
    ,Quantity
    --,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [Equinor PAYG Cost]
    ,EffectivePrice * Quantity as [RI Cost]
    --,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    ,ProductOrderName
    ,PartNumber
    ,ChargeType
    ,PricingModel
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/202303*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where ChargeType = 'UnusedReservation' and (PricingModel = 'Reservation' or PricingModel = 'SavingsPlan') --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' --and format([Date],'yyyy-MM') = '2022-12'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ProductOrderName,PartNumber, ChargeType, PricingModel --, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType')
order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW Combined_Actual_Savings
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/*/ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where [Date] >= '2022-12-31'

UNION --ALL

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/daily/ACMDailyActualCost/ACMDailyActualCost.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where [Date] <= '2022-12-31'

    ,upper(MeterSubCategory) as [VM Series]
    ,FORMAT(sum(CostInBillingCurrency), 'N', 'en-us') as Cost
    --,Quantity
    --,format(sum(Quantity), 'N', 'en-us') as Quantity
    --,UnitOfMeasure
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/2023*/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_2023*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'
    group BY upper(MeterSubCategory), format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
    order by [Date], sum(CostInBillingCurrency) DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 1000 *
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    PartNumber,
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    ServiceInfo2
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAc*/2022*/A*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL' --and ReservationName != '' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), PartNumber, ProductName, MeterCategory, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs'), ServiceInfo2
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), sum(Quantity) DESC

SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType, 
    JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs') as VCPUs, 
    substring([Date],0,8) as [Date], 
    sum(ConsumedQuantity) as ConsumedQuantity,
    PartNumber,
    Product,
    ServiceInfo2
    --,sum(Cost) as Cost
    --TOP 1000 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/monthly/2022/*/*-cleaned.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
--WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines Licenses'
----Filtering on only Windows Server HUB VM's, there is also Windows Client BYOL but this is not relecant for VM HUB savings calculations
----I've removed "Product LIKE '%Spot%'" part is not required as spot machine still come under "MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines'"
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 LIKE 'Windows Server BYOL'
GROUP BY JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType'), substring([Date],0,8), PartNumber, Product, ServiceInfo2, JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.VCPUs')
ORDER BY substring([Date],0,8), ConsumedQuantity DESC

SELECT
    --TOP 1000 *
    ai_ServiceType as ServiceType, 
    ai_VCPUs as VCPUs, 
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date], 
    sum(Quantity) as Quantity,
    PartNumber,
    ProductName,
    MeterCategory,
    ServiceInfo2
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyActualCost/202*/Extended_v2_ACMMonthlyActualCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ServiceInfo2 = 'Windows Server BYOL' --and ReservationName != '' and Product LIKE '%Spot%'
    and [Date] >= '2022-11-01' and [Date] <= '2023-10-31'
GROUP BY ai_ServiceType, format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), PartNumber, ProductName, MeterCategory, ai_VCPUs, ServiceInfo2
ORDER BY format([Date], 'yyyy-MM'), sum(Quantity) DESC

SELECT

    --,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    --avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    --,EffectivePrice as EffectivePrice
    --,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [PAYG Cost]
    --,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    --,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as Cost
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity 
    ,[Date]
    --,ReservationName
FROM
    OPENROWSET(

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
where 
    ChargeType = 'Refund' 
    and PricingModel = 'Reservation' 
    and (ReservationName like 'S037_%' OR ReservationName like 'VM_RI_%')

    --and MeterCategory = 'Virtual Machines' and ChargeType = 'Usage'
--group by ReservationName, format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') 
--order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName
group by [Date] --, ReservationName
order by [Date]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 10 *
    ReservationName
    ,format([Date],'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,JSON_VALUE(AdditionalInfo, '$.ServiceType') as ServiceType
    ,avg(UnitPrice) as UnitPrice
    ,avg(EffectivePrice) as EffectivePrice
    ,sum(Quantity) as Quantity
    ,sum(UnitPrice * Quantity) as [Equinor PAYG Cost]
    ,sum(EffectivePrice * Quantity) as [RI Cost]
    ,sum((UnitPrice - EffectivePrice) * Quantity) as TotalUsedSavings
    ,ProductOrderName
    ,PartNumber
    ,ChargeType
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAm*/2022*/A*.parquet',

order by format([Date],'yyyy-MM'), ReservationName

-- Create the Calendar table
CREATE TABLE Calendar
(
    [Date] DATE,
    [Year] INT,
    [Month] INT,
    [Day] INT,
    [Quarter] INT,
    [DayOfWeek] INT,
    [Weekday] INT,
    [WeekOfYear] INT,
    [MonthName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [DayName] NVARCHAR(20),
    [IsHoliday] INT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
);

-- Create the clustered columnstore index
CREATE CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX idx_Columnstore ON Calendar;

-- Optional: Create additional indexes or constraints if needed
-- CREATE INDEX idx_Date ON dbo.Calendar([Date]);
-- ALTER TABLE dbo.Calendar ADD CONSTRAINT pk_Calendar PRIMARY KEY ([Date]);

-- Create the Calendar table using CTAS
CREATE TABLE Calendar
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT
    [Date],
    YEAR([Date]) AS [Year],
    MONTH([Date]) AS [Month],
    DAY([Date]) AS [Day],
    DATEPART(QUARTER, [Date]) AS [Quarter],
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayOfWeek],
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, [Date]) IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS [Weekday],
    DATEPART(WEEK, [Date]) AS [WeekOfYear],
    DATENAME(MONTH, [Date]) AS [MonthName],
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, [Date]) AS [DayName],
    0 AS [IsHoliday] -- Set IsHoliday value based on your specific requirements
FROM
    (SELECT CAST('2000-01-01' AS DATE) AS [Date] UNION ALL SELECT DATEADD(DAY, 1, [Date]) FROM dbo.Calendar WHERE [Date] < '2030-12-31') AS c
OPTION (LABEL = 'Create Calendar', SINGLE_BLOB);
